scripts.run:win32: docker run -d --link redis:redis --name oh-eth -e ETHERSCAN_KEY=%npm_package_config_ETHERSCAN_KEY% -e ETHERSCAN_TYPE=%npm_package_config_ETHERSCAN_TYPE% -e DEBUG=%npm_package_config_DEBUG% -e KEYV_AUTH_NAMESPACE=%npm_package_config_KEYV_AUTH_NAMESPACE% -p 8080:8080 oh-eth
scripts.run:darwin:freebsd:linux:sunos: docker run -d --link redis:redis --name oh-eth -e ETHERSCAN_KEY=$npm_package_config_ETHERSCAN_KEY -e ETHERSCAN_TYPE=$npm_package_config_ETHERSCAN_TYPE -e DEBUG=$npm_package_config_DEBUG -e KEYV_AUTH_NAMESPACE=$npm_package_config_KEYV_AUTH_NAMESPACE -p 8080:8080 oh-eth
scripts.rediscli: docker run -it --rm --link redis:redis redis redis-cli -h redis -p 6379
scripts.clean: docker kill oh-eth && docker rm oh-eth
